item.title: Post: Karabiner
item.description: Grumbled on Twitter about the MBP TouchBar as a Vim user. genehack mentioned I could map Caps Lock to Control (my usual) and Escape, given the right tools. Ten minutes later I had Karabiner Elements installed, a keyboard rule imported, and Vim happiness once again. Definitely going to mess more with Karabiner.
item.content:encoded:
Grumbled on Twitter about the MBP TouchBar as a Vim user. genehack mentioned I could map Caps Lock to Control (my usual) and Escape, given the right tools. Ten minutes later I had Karabiner Elements installed, a keyboard rule imported, and Vim happiness once again.

Definitely going to mess more with Karabiner.
